trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of characters to be stored in or retrieved from the database.
trans-unit.target: 表示要存储在数据库中或从数据库中检索的字符的可变长度流。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> has a different underlying data structure from its corresponding .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.String" /> data type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 具有与其相应的 .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.String" /> 数据类型不同的基础数据结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> always uses the default <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> from the current thread, but <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> contains its own locale Id and compare flags.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String> 始终使用默认值<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>从当前线程，但<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>包含自己的区域设置 Id 和比较标志。

trans-unit.source: The comparison result of two <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> structures is independent of operating system and current thread locale.
trans-unit.target: 两个比较结果<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>结构是独立于操作系统和当前线程区域设置。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> comparison operators, note that if the LCIDs of arguments are different, comparison functions throw an exception because they cannot be compared.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>比较运算符，请注意，是否自变量的 Lcid 不同，比较函数引发异常，因为它们不能进行比较。

trans-unit.source: For example, the statement
trans-unit.target: 例如，语句

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to
trans-unit.target: 等效于

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" />，它是 <paramref name="x" /> 与 <paramref name="y" /> 的串联值。

trans-unit.target: `x` 将在随后出现第一个显示<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>后, 跟`y`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> structure that represents information about the culture of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 结构，它表示有关此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 对象的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> structure that describes information about the culture of this SqlString structure including the names of the culture, the writing system, and the calendar used, and also access to culture-specific objects that provide methods for common operations, such as formatting dates and sorting strings.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 结构，描述有关此 SqlString 结构的区域性的信息，包括区域性的名称、书写体系和使用的日历，还包括对特定于区域性对象的访问，这些对象提供常规运算的方法，例如格式化日期和排序字符串。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of two structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 对两个结构执行逻辑比较，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.target: 要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Equals will return <see langword="true" /> if the object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 的实例并且两者相等，则相等比较将返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 对两个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 操作数执行逻辑比较，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two values are equal.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If either instance is null, then the <see langword="SqlString" /> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一实例为 null，则 <see langword="SqlString" /> 将为 null。

trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD)。

trans-unit.target: 指示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 的 XSD 的 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> operands to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
trans-unit.target: 对两个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 操作数执行逻辑比较，以确定第一个操作数是否大于第二个操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />，如果第一个实例大于第二个实例，则它为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 的任一实例为空，则 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 将为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> operands to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 对两个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 操作数执行逻辑比较，以确定第一个操作数是否大于或等于第二个操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />，如果第一个实例大于或等于第二个实例，则为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 的任一实例为空，则 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 将为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> comparisons should ignore case.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 比较应忽略大小写。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreCase> functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreCase> 充当的常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串比较必须忽略假名类型。

trans-unit.source: Kana type refers to Japanese hiragana and katakana characters that represent phonetic sounds in the Japanese language.
trans-unit.target: 假名类型是指日语平假名和片假名字符，它们表示日语中的语音。

trans-unit.source: Hiragana is used for native Japanese expressions and words, while katakana is used for words borrowed from other languages, such as "computer" or "Internet".
trans-unit.target: 平假名用于表示日语自有的短语和字词，而片假名用于表示从其他语言借用的字词，如“computer”或“Internet”。

trans-unit.source: A phonetic sound can be expressed in both hiragana and katakana.
trans-unit.target: 语音既可以用平假名也可以用片假名表示。

trans-unit.source: If this value is selected, the hiragana character for one sound is considered equal to the katakana character for the same sound.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该值，则认为一个语音的平假名字符等于同一语音的片假名字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreKanaType> functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreKanaType> 充当的常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore non-space combining characters, such as diacritics.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串比较必须忽略非空格组合字符，比如音调符号。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines combining characters as characters that are combined with base characters to produce a new character.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 标准将组合字符定义为与基字符组合起来产生新字符的字符。

trans-unit.source: Non-space combining characters do not use character space by themselves when rendered.
trans-unit.target: 非空格组合字符在呈现时本身不占用字符空间。

trans-unit.source: For more information about non-space combining characters, see the Unicode Standard at http://www.unicode.org.
trans-unit.target: 非空格组合字符有关的详细信息，请参阅 Unicode 标准的http://www.unicode.org。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreNonSpace> functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreNonSpace> 充当的常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore the character width.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串比较必须忽略字符宽度。

trans-unit.source: For example, Japanese katakana characters can be written as full-width or half-width and, if this value is selected, the katakana characters written as full-width are considered equal to the same characters written in half-width.
trans-unit.target: 例如，日语片假名字符可以写为全角或半角形式；如果选择该值，则认为写为全角形式的片假名字符等于写为半角形式的同一字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreWidth> functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.IgnoreWidth> 充当的常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>类。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 结构是否为 null。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.Value" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.Null" />，则返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the geographical locale and language for the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString" /> 结构的地理区域设置和语言。
